text: Barbro Anna Elisabet Hildestrand (née Kollberg; 27 December 1917 - 6 March 2014) was a Swedish actress. She is best known for her roles in Hem från Babylon (1941), It Rains on Our Love (1946), A Life for the Taking (1995) and As It Is in Heaven (2004). She was born in Eskilstuna, Södermanland County. Kollberg died on 6 March 2014 in Stockholm. She was 96 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Barbro Kollberg at the Swedish Film Database Category:1917 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors
title: Barbro Kollberg
